short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Extension that will shorten any link on a web page with the OkShort API for fast, and easy sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OkShort is a fast, easy, and secure way to shorten a URL!
Say goodbye to long, hard to read links. Shorten any link for free, in just one click! All you have to add a link to the GUI or right click a link on any page, and OkShort will condense it down to just a few characters.

Your privacy is important to us, that's why we don't track any user data like the big players do. They will track things like your IP address, websites you visit, your location, and more.
